body: They do exist, I believe in the 12th volume of the light novel, darkness was challenged by a noble to fight his rare pet orcs, but darness' pure wicked lust scared them away, putting the noble in a position of extreme disappointment.
@Supers0n1c Im pretty sure you got it spot on
You are a an orc. Yes, you filthy little piggy. Now squeal piggy squeal reee reeeeeeee.

The orc kinda makes no sense since, if you watched the movie, Megumin said there are no more male orcs in the world. I believed that they were all hunted down , leaving only the female orcs. They hunt down male humans and whenever they give birth to a male orc they all have sex with him so much that the little orc dies. We see Kazuma being chased by a giant group of orcs chasing him down and almost got raped until Yunyun saved him.
Missing pages indeed. Want more of Darkness too!!
